p: In the raw materials of the T. terrestris, the maximum accumulation of macro- and microelements was observed in June. By August, the content of Na, Mg, K, Cl, and Ca decreases. Wild plants T. terrestris (natural growth in China) accumulate much more basic elements. The conditions of culture in the Russia (Botanical garden in North-West of Russia, St. Petersburg) do not contribute to the accumulation of basic elements in herb of the T. terrestris.
